project.description: This job submits packages from the "staging" subproject of an OBS project to the main project. Only packages that built successfully are submitted.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: project
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the main project that should be updated with packages from its staging project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: subproject
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the subproject that acts as staging project.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
case $subproject in None) echo "No valid 'subproject' provided - defaults for safety reasons to 'None'" exit 1 ;; "-") echo "Subproject set to '-': skip job, do not fail (eg. for Master project)" exit 0 ;; esac
COS=$project COSS=$COS:$subproject export OBS_CHECKOUT=/home/jenkins/OBS_CHECKOUT/$COSS OSC="osc -A https://api.opensuse.org" submitcmd="echo no submit for project=$project"
case $project in Cloud:OpenStack:[EFGH]*) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" ;; *) echo "Please add support for the project: $project" exit 1 esac
for COMPONENT in `$OSC ls $COSS 2>/dev/null` do cd $OBS_CHECKOUT || exit 1 cd $COMPONENT || exit 1
grep -q "<linkinfo" .osc/_files || exit 2
if $OSC rdiff $COS $COMPONENT $COSS | grep . && $OSC api /build/$COSS/SLE_11_SP2/x86_64/$COMPONENT/_status | grep -q 'code="succeeded"' then $submitcmd $COSS $COMPONENT $COS fi done
